PatientDetails.Name: Jeffrey Cochran
HospitalCourse: Admitted on 09/16/2024 for shortness of breath and fatigue.
Underwent right thoracotomy, decortication, and right lower lobectomy on 09/17/2024 for empyema and pneumonia.
Chest tubes were placed due to fluid drainage.
Postoperative period marked by complications such as sepsis and ongoing management of empyema.

ElectronicMedicalRecords.HospitalDischarge: Discharged on 10/15/2024 after recovery from surgical procedure and stabilization.

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: Sepsis was diagnosed during hospitalization; blood cultures indicated infection, and a treatment plan was established.

BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: No blood transfusion administered during this encounter.
